title: The Bachelor's Matty J and Laura Byrne arrive in Italy as they holiday in Europe with Marlie-Mae
text:
Jetting off on a whirlwind trip through Europe, The Bachelor's Matty J and Laura Byrne are certainly living the dream.

But the engaged couple have revealed it's not all as glamorous as it appears online.

Arriving in Italy, the new parents caught whiff of a worrying smell while in their hotel room with baby daughter Marlie-Mae.

Uh oh! The Bachelor's Laura Byrne (pictured) and Matty J discovered an unfortunate package in their luggage as they arrived in Italy with baby daughter Marlie-Mae (pictured)

As they opened up their suitcase, they soon found the culprit - a rogue poo-filled nappy.

Sharing the honest snap on his Instagram, Matty posted: 'Wondered why a weird smell was following us around - turns out I left a FULL nappy in Laura's bag since Paris...'

In the photo, Laura looks unimpressed as she holds the offending nappy in one hand next to their three-month-old daughter.

As The Bachelor's success story, the couple welcomed their daughter in June and now they're enjoying their first holiday together.

Smile! Matty J and Laura Byrne (pictured) have shared adorable snaps from their trip, jetting from London to Paris, and then onto Italy

They've shared adorable snaps from their trip, jetting from London to Paris, and then onto Italy.

From visiting London's Trafalgar Square to the Eiffel Tower and The Louvre in Paris, they've certainly made the most of their trip.

In one snap taken in England, the doting parents were pictured beaming widely in full winter attire - while little Marlie-Mae wrapped up in a cute orange hat with matching dress.

Matty, 32, shared another snap of himself gripping onto his smiling tot, on a rooftop in London.

'25hrs later and we made it!' Matty J revealed the couple had travelled over a day with their three-month-old daughter in tow

'That smile is gonna be the end of me!' Matty J then posted a cute image of his little girl on his lap, during their first ever train journey together

He wrote: '25hrs later and we made it!'

After sharing an excitable video outside of Buckingham Palace, Matty then posted a cute image of his daughter sitting on his lap during their first train journey.

Alongside the snap - which featured Marlie-Mae sporting an adorable fluffy lamb jumper complete with ears - he wrote: 'That smile is gonna be the end of me!'

London lady! Laura looked absolutely sensational as she strutted her stuff in England, despite having gone through a stressful flight with the pair's baby daughter

The couple were working with the clothing label Next during their trip to London, with Laura wearing several outfits from the high-street label.

Last month, Laura told WHO magazine that the loved-up pair 'definitely' want more children.

They however admitted they aren't in a rush to expand their family until after their wedding next year.

'We keep saying we definitely want to have more than one baby. I'm not rushing into doing it tomorrow, but we would love another kid,' she told the magazine.

The pair's love story famously began when Matty chose Laura as the winner of The Bachelor back in 2017.

They confirmed their engagement in April this year.
description: The Bachelor's Matty J and Laura Byrne (pictured) reveal the less than glamorous side of parenthood as they jet off on holiday.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
